About me

A sneak peak at what I do

learn more about who I am, what I do, and what I to table.

Namaste!

I'm Surbhi Verma, a passionate front-end developer currently pursuing a BCA degree. I discovered my love for web development while exploring Awwwards. Inspired by the stunning and innovative designs featured there, I decided to pursue a career in front-end development.

Join me on this journey of learning and creating!
